house_listing.house_description: ADDL.PHOTOS WWW.STAR-ONE.COM*VALUE IS IN THE LAND. 2 TOBACCO BARNS, 4 PONDS LEE'S CREEK RUNS LENGTH OF PROPERTY, 241 TON SILO, 2 CISTERNS,DBL CORN CRIB 2 CAR GAR,2 OLD HOUSES W/HISTORICAL PROPERTIES.HOUSES MAY NOT BE RESTORABLE
